#Steps to install and start Adastra

= Introduction =

These are instructions on how to use Adastra. Everything should be straight-forward. No special skills are required. 

= Details =
  * [http://www.microsoft.com/net/download.aspx MS .NET framework 4.0] is required
  * download and unzip Adastra in any folder
  * install OpenVibe 10.1 or later (usually in c:\Program Files\openvibe) 
  * start Adastra (Adastra.exe) and set OpenVibe's install folder in the main form (if not set automatically)

= Additional notes =
OpenVibe is started by Adastra, you do not need to start it in advance. Adastra modifies one of the OpenVibe's bat files in order to resolve a bug with parameters forwarding in OpenVibe 10.1. Currently Adastra runs only on Windows. Running Adastra under [http://www.mono-project.com Mono] is currently unsupported, but not impossible.
